contentrichtext.text: '''Khar''' may refer to: In '''geography''': * [[Khar, Punjab]], a town in the Punjab Province, Pakistan * [[Khar, Bajaur]], a town in the Bajaur Agency of the Federally Administered Tribal Areas, Pakistan * [[Khar, Mumbai]], a suburb of Mumbai, India * [[Khar, Nepal]], a village in Nepal In '''names''' * [[Khar clan]] is a clan name in [[Pakistan]] * [[Hina Rabbani Khar]], foreign minister of Pakistan * [[Ghulam Mustafa Khar]], former governor of Punjab province in Pakistan In '''other uses''': * [[KHAR]], a radio station in Anchorage, Alaska, United States * [[Khar clan]], a clan of the Jat tribe in Pakistan * Khar, an [[Ancient Egyptian units of measurement|Ancient Egyptian unit of measurement]] used for volume ==See also== * [[Khara (disambiguation)]] * [[Kar (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
